price: Wir machten sie nicht zu Körpern, die keine Speise essen, und sie waren nicht unsterblich.
arabic: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ جَسَدٗا لَّا يَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَمَا كَانُواْ خَٰلِدِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wamā jaʿalnāhum jasadan lā yakulūna al-ṭaʿāma wamā kānū khālidīna
